data.title: About Our Store Dave Sinclair Ford
data.meta_description: Dave Sinclair Ford has been the leading Ford Dealership in St. Louis and the surrounding state of Missouri area for 50 years and counting.
data.text:
History of Dave Sinclair Ford

Why buy at Dave Sinclair Ford?... Dave Sinclair Ford has been the leading Ford Dealership in St. Louis and the surrounding region for 50 years and counting; for three of those years, Dave Sinclair Ford was the #1 Ford Dealer in the United States. We are most proud of our numerous President's Award and 100 Club accreditations from Ford. The President's Award is the highest rating for the "best" in Customer Satisfaction and we have consistently been a recipient of this prestigious award. The 100 Club is for achieving sales volume ranking within the top 100 dealers in the country.

Dave Sinclair Ford is a family owned and operated business located in South County, St. Louis, Missouri. We are a group of family and friends working together to provide you excellent service while you are purchasing a new or used vehicle, or when you are in need of service, work, or parts. The values and integrity you will experience are the cumulative efforts and results of a founder dedicated to providing the absolute best experience and service possible to his customers. The values of the Dave Sinclair operation are that of a man who fought in World War II, labored as a union hod carrier, serviced our community as a police officer, and lead the St. Louis Automotive Industry to conduct themselves with character and integrity. The Sinclair family has provided quality experiences for their customers and honorable employment for hundreds of St. Louisans.

The Sinclair Family is dedicated to the Community and Business of St. Louis. When you visit our stores you will be surrounded by Sinclair Family Members: Mr. Sinclair has 4 Sons, 3 Son-in-Laws, and 37 grandchildren. Be assured, there is more than enough character, integrity, and experience to provide you with the most rewarding experience possible. We continue to strive to provide an exemplary work environment for our employees, outstanding customer experiences, and to support the community through various charities and sponsorships. Please visit our store and experience the Sinclair difference!

"Thank you, And Here is Our Address": 7466 South Lindbergh, St. Louis, Mo. 63125

Dave Sinclair Ford welcomes South County, Mehlville, St. Louis, Sunset Hills and Kirkwood, Missouri area drivers to our full-service Ford car dealership. We have been serving as St. Louis, MO's Ford dealership for over 50 years! A legacy started by Dave Sinclair Sr. You can learn more about that below.

As a proud member of the community, we sponsor local high school sports programs, local charity events and more including Backstoppers, St. Louis Children's Hospital and Ranken Jordan. We are committed to providing our local community members with low prices on quality new Ford and used cars, expert automotive service and more. Browse our website to learn more about the many auto services we provide, shop our new Ford inventory online, then visit us soon!

New Ford Cars, Trucks and SUVs and Used Cars for Sale

Here at Dave Sinclair Ford, we specialize in offering the latest lineup of new Ford cars, trucks and SUVs at competitive prices. From the new Ford F-150 and Explorer to the latest Fusion and Escape models, they are all in-stock here at our Ford dealership. Our selection of late-model used cars is tough to top; we carry used cars from a variety of automakers. Apply for auto financing online now to get a head start on your purchase of a new Ford or pre-owned car at Dave Sinclair Ford.

Professional Auto Service with Genuine Ford Parts

The service center at Dave Sinclair Ford is home to Ford Certified technicians who are also certified through ASE to work on all makes and models. If you drive a Ford or Lincoln, know that our service department is the place to turn, since we employ Ford Master Technicians and Senior Master Technicians, the highest level of Ford certification. You can schedule service online.
